2025-12-19PMOPublic Service Employment ActAppointment of the Senior Advisor, Employment and Social Development CanadaAppointment of Sandra Hassan of Gatineau, Quebec, to be Senior Advisor, Employment and Social Development Canada, to hold office during pleasure, effective January 12, 2026.N/A
subject: Appointment of the Senior Advisor, Employment and Social Development Canada
precis: Appointment of Sandra Hassan of Gatineau, Quebec, to be Senior Advisor, Employment and Social Development Canada, to hold office during pleasure, effective January 12, 2026.
